name: Not Just a Number
description:
The Counted aims to do what government agencies couldn't - create a comprehensive database of those killed by police in the United States in 2015 and 2016. 

 All characters and events are works of fiction. This does not seek to offend but aims to discourage the binary thinking of "good" vs. "bad". 

Statistics are gathered using the Socrata database API and thus the narrative is subject to change. 

Content may be deemed sensitive to some users.
